task.title: Log in Extension User Portal
task.shortdesc: After setting up extensions, the super administrator will send an email that contains the login information to the extension users. You can check the email to get the login information of Extension User Portal.

step.cmd: Open the email that is sent by the administrator, click the reset password link to set the login password.

info.note: The reset password link is valid in 24 hours.

step.cmd: Visit the PBX domain, enter the email address that is bound with the extension and the password, click Login.
